metadata.title: CVE-2021-44775 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) issue in Website app of Odoo Community 15.0 andearlier and Odoo Enterprise 15.0 and earlier, allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script in the browser of a victim, by posting craftedcontents.

criterions.comment: odoo package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
